DistributionFromCorpusElection.ElectionDesc: PURSUANT TO IRC 4942(H)(2), REG. 53.4942(A)-3(D)(2), AND REG. 1.170A-9(H)(2)(V), THE ABOVE REFERENCED FOUNDATION HEREBY ELECTS TO TREAT THE FOLLOWING CURRENT YEAR QUALIFYING DISTRIBUTIONS (WHICH ARE IN EXCESS OF THE IMMEDIATELY PRECEDING TAX YEAR'S UNDISTRIBUTED INCOME) AS BEING MADE OUT OF CORPUS: AMOUNT: $309,560,054 THESE QUALIFYING DISTRIBUTIONS WERE PAID PRIOR TO MARCH 15, 2022 TO QUALIFY THE BLOOMBERG FAMILY FOUNDATION AS A FOUNDATION DESCRIBED IN SECTION 170(B)(1)(A)(VII) AND 170(B)(1)(F)(II) IN 2021.

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT AIMS AND OBJECTIVES OF THE BLOOMBERG PHILANTHROPIES PUBLIC HEALTH PROGRAM; $1,914,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/21. THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 11/13/15 WAS AMENDED ON 1/31/2019 AND 10/5/2020. AMENDED ON 1/1/2021 EXTENDING GRANT TO 12/31/2022. DATES OF REPORTS BY GRANTEE:2/28/16 8/31/16 2/28/17 09/15/17 12/31/17 2/15/19 9/15/19 1/31/20 10/31/20 2/15/21 3/5/22

A LOAN FOR PORTABLE SOLAR LIGHTING AND POWER PRODUCTS FOR OFF-GRID CONSUMERS. $4,000,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/16. THE ORIGINAL LOAN DATED 04/01/14 WAS SUBSEQUENTLY AMENDED ON 5/29/15, 10/04/17 AND 8/23/2019 WHEREAS THE LAST AMENDMENT EXTENDED THE REPAYMENT TERM TO 12/31/2025. IN 2018, AN ALLOWANCE OF $3,874,385 WAS APPLIED BASED ON AN ASSESSMENT OF LOAN COLLECTABILITY.

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: A GRANT AGREEMENT IN THE AMOUNT OF $6,000,000 WAS EXECUTED ON 12/19/22. THE FIRST INSTALLMENT WAS MADE IN JANUARY 2023. THIS GRANT IS TO SUPPORT BLOOMBERG PHILANTROPIES COLLEGE ACCESS AND SUCCESS INITIATIVE.

GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: GROSS SALES PRICE FOR ALL ASSETS ON LINE 6A AS REPORTED ON LINE 6B OF $0 INCLUDE ONLY DIRECT SALES OF ASSETS OWNED BY THE BLOOMBERG FAMILY FOUNDATION INC. NET GAIN FROM SALES ON ASSETS OF $161,105,285 AS REPORTED ONLINE 6A COLUMN (A) INCLUDES PASS THRU GAINS AS FOLLOWS: THRU PARTNERSHIP INVESTMENTS 161,105,285. TOTAL REPORTED ON LINE 6A COLUMN (A) 161,105,285.SINCE THE PASS THRU ENTITIES DO NOT REPORT ALLOCABLE SALES PROCEEDS, LINE 6B DOES NOT INCLUDE ANY ALLOCABLE SHARE OF GROSS PROCEEDS FROM THE SALES THAT GENERATED FLOW THRU GAINS REPORTED ON LINE 6A.
